text: Antoni Opolski (11 June 1913 - 17 March 2014) was a Polish physicist. His field was astronomy and astrophysics. After World War II, he worked at the astronomical observatory of the University of Wrocław. He retired in 1983. He was born in Rozwadów (now Lviv Oblast, Ukraine). Opolski died from natural causes on 17 March 2014 in Wrocław, Poland. He was 100 years old.
